briefdescription.para: Read 1D plasma data from HDF5 file.

parameterdescription.para: HDF5 file from which data is read

briefdescription.para: Read 1Dt plasma data from HDF5 file.

parameterdescription.para: HDF5 file from which data is read

briefdescription.para: Load plasma data from HDF5 file and prepare parameters.

detaileddescription.para: This function reads the 1D plasma data from file f, fills the offload struct with parameters and allocates and fills the offload array.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to pointer to offload array

briefdescription.para: Read plasma data from HDF5 file.

detaileddescription.para: This function reads plasma data with given qid while also initializing offload data and allocating and filling offload array. The file is opened and closed outside this function.

parameterdescription.para: HDF5 file from which data is read

simplesect.para: Zero if reading and initialization of data succeeded

briefdescription.para: Module for reading plasma input from HDF5 file.

detaileddescription.para: Plasma data must be read by calling hdf5_plasma_init_offload() contained in this module. This module contains reading routines for all plasma data types.
